betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Together with the tribal Gallifreyans, traces of another full-fledged civilization are present, and a technological people nevertehless. One that unfortunately is now gone.
The black hole moon, that is their making. This was likely their power source, an ever-collapsing singularity, now long collapsed.
I am struggling at putting together a clear timeline, but my gut tells me this technological society lived here before the coming of the Recursion of Worthiness. With this power present, capable of calling incredibly powerful beings from all around the universe, I cannot see a dominant society living here.
Given the nature of this place, I would not be surprised if this technological civilization existed even before the tribal worshippers of the sun.
Who knwos what type of catastophe must have brought down this civilization! 
And even more puzzling, where do the tribes come from? Are they what's left of a once technological people?
Is it advanced technology that brought forth this world's regression?
